data.text:
@agnostoxxx He's an animal now?

Lol, so predictable it hurts.
@agnostoxxx I don’t know, but part of me likes to believe that if Russian nuclear command received a batshit crazy launch order, they would tell him to fuck off and probably Putin exit stage right
@agnostoxxx Almost as comical as millions of people staying "six feet" apart while moving about in public spaces, or wearing non-airtight masks, etc...
@agnostoxxx So he is a loose cannon
@agnostoxxx The Russian people are very brave, hard to believe that they can’t contain this madman
@randomtalkwalk He was an animal from before no question
@agnostoxxx Really? A lot of had to isolate during COVId without the luxuries of a Russian billionaire. But none of us are looking to kill innocent people.
@cakani_ylli @agnostoxxx So you want what happened to the Middle East to happen to a country with nuclear warheads all over it faced at us and Europe. Excuse me for asking but are you retarded?
@jenstilmanydots @agnostoxxx This is propaganda to justify regime change.
